content: perfect for fall so handsome so squishy the perfect combination of fall decor and cozy cables final pumpkin size is roughly 12-14 inches in diameter but could vary widely depending on stuffing materials needed orange worsted weight yarn for pumpkin ~600 yds brown worsted weight yarn for stem ~25 yds stiff yarn will help the stem hold its shape size 2 dpns size 6 circular needles 16 or 24 inch should work cable needle or extra dpn stitch markers stuffing crochet hook or darning needle please note this is my first pattern written and hasn t been through test knitting i am not a professional please reach out if you run into typos or issues it s free for this reason update 9/4/21 revised due to typos at rounds 104 to 107 115 and 124 special thanks to ramonaanne for helping to catch them
